moves.name: Dire Hit
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.effect: The user gets ready to attack. Using this move again will cause the user to leave this posture, then attack. No other actions can be taken while ready to attack. The preparation period is skipped when the weather is sunny, and the user will attack right away.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Critical Strike 1
passives.description: Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.

passives.name: Agile Entry 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s evasiveness by 1 stat rank when it enters a battle.
